_source.description_text: Bring a tough-luxe edge to your footwear rotation with these black Fallon knee-high boots from Gianvito Rossi. Made in Italy from smooth calf leather, this slip-on pair is embellished with gold-tone chains and set on chunky rubber soles.
_source.name: Fallon leather knee-high boots

_source.description_text: Knee-high boots are always a winner - the vertical line will do wonders both in keeping you warm and giving the illusion of longer legs. Gianvito Rossi's pair is made from smooth black leather and has gold anklets inspired by equestrian hardware. Wear yours with a knitted dress, leggings or tucked-in pants.
_source.name: GIANVITO ROSSI Chain-embellished leather knee boots

_source.description_text: Christian Louboutin's 'Civiliza' knee boots will make your legs look endless. Crafted in Italy from black textured-leather, they have almond toes and stacked wedge heels that make them extra comfortable and easy to walk in.
_source.name: CHRISTIAN LOUBOUTIN Civiliza 100 textured-leather wedge knee boots

_source.description_text: Whether you're a whizz on eight wheels or simply appreciate the retro influences behind the design, there's much to adore about Bottega Veneta's 'The Quilt' roller skates. This pair has been crafted by hand at the house's atelier from supple leather and takes inspiration from '70s court style sneakers with gum rubber midsoles. They have cushioned collars and sturdy rubber wheels.
_source.name: BOTTEGA VENETA The Quilt lace-up leather roller skates

_source.description_text: BONDI BORN's 'Rainey' bikini is designed in a simple bandeau silhouette with ties at one side that create a ruched effect and adjust the shape. It's made from stretch fabric in a subdued 'Butter' shade that coordinates perfectly with the matching high-rise briefs. This product was Locally Made. Find out more about NET SUSTAIN here.
_source.name: BONDI BORN + NET SUSTAIN Rainey bandeau bikini top

_source.description_text: With their crystal-embellished slingback straps, the Love Link 105 pumps from Aquazzura are an elegant addition to your festive edit. They're set on 105mm stiletto heels with pointed toes and grosgrain uppers.
sizes: Fits slightly large to size - we recommend trying a half size smaller
_source.name: Love Link 105 slingback pumps

_source.description_text: Aquazzura's 'Love Link' pumps take their name from themes of sensuality and seduction. Made from white grosgrain, they have 105mm stiletto heels and crystal-embellished slingback straps. Pair yours with a silk slip dress.
_source.name: AQUAZZURA Love Link 105 crystal-embellished grosgrain slingback pumps

_source.description_text: This eponymous ski suit is Cordova's signature style, made from weatherproof fabrics that will keep you warm and dry on the slopes. The flared cuffs, side stripes and high neck nod to sporting styles from the '70s resurrected in the coolest way.
_source.name: CORDOVA The Cordova striped ski suit

_source.description_text: Alongside its usual roster of sharply tailored trousers and blazers and full-skirted dresses, Alexander McQueen slotted a few more low-key pieces into its latest collection for your downtime. Whipped up in snuggly cotton jersey, these jogging bottoms are shaped to a tapered silhouette, so you can still nip to the shops and answer the door in both comfort and style. On the back pocket, you’ll spot the finishing touch: a subtly embroidered logo.
_source.name: Tapered high-rise cotton-blend jogging bottoms

_source.description_text: Alexander McQueen's track pants are cut from soft cotton-jersey in a pretty blush hue. They have an elasticated, high-rise waistband, cropped cuffs and the label's logo embroidered at the back. Wear yours while lounging around the house or running errands.
_source.name: ALEXANDER MCQUEEN Cropped embroidered cotton-jersey track pants

_source.description_text: Eres' bikini top is made from the label's signature peau douce fabric that's equally flattering and comfortable. Part of the 'Les Essentiels' range, it has underwired cups and a flattering halterneck.Wear it with: [Eres Bikini briefs id1224921], [Zimmermann Sunglasses id1176444].
_source.name: ERES Les Essentiels Bandito underwired halterneck bikini top

_source.description_text: Gucci’s hoodie is made from lightweight silk-twill decorated with the house's 'GG Supreme' print. Inspired by vintage track styles, it's fitted with a drawstring hood and trimmed with metallic webbing along each sleeve.
_source.name: GUCCI Metallic webbing-trimmed printed silk-twill hoodie

_source.description_text: Gabriela Hearst's 'Vita' pants are modeled in a flattering, retro-inspired silhouette. Made from wool, they're designed to sit high on the waist and kick out just below the knee to voluminous flares. Wear yours with a tucked-in top.
_source.name: GABRIELA HEARST Vita wool flared pants
